My input (in bold)

Orcs

New Attacks-
 
 Rage - makes player speed up for limited time, attacks are stronger,
time limit and strength of speed and attack go up as players levels increase.
(This is good, perhaps when the rage ends, orc takes some damage, like being winded.)

Insert good name(Drain Mana) -  This attack drains mana from 
 surrounding enemies, it would be a counter to the heavily dependent 
 characters, such as mage and cleric.
(Pretty useless, draining down your very little mana as an orc to
drain down a miniscule meaningless portion of a spellcaster whom makes it back very fast.)

Frenzy-  A quick series of strikes.  (effectively sending the attack commands at the same instant.)


Archers

New Attacks 

Freeze arrow- when enemy is hit with this arrow they take damage and 
are frozen for a certain period of time.
(This could be bad, arrow after arrow, its like being in a crowd of faeries,
much too frustrating, especially since archers can attack fairly fast (faster than faeries).

Ethereal Arrow- single arrow that travels through trees (and walls 
maybe) and does damage when hits enemy.
(Good, reasonable, maybe even goes through enemies, and can strike multiple targets,
the arrow would end at the edge of map, or after a long range, damage on these type of
arrows should be lowered considerably due to its special effects)

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
